Package com.hotelreservation.model

Class Promo

java.lang.Object
com.hotelreservation.model.Promo
public class Promo extends Object
Represents a promotional offer in the hotel.

  • Constructor Details

    • Promo

      public Promo(String promoId, String code, String description, double discountAmount, LocalDate validFrom, LocalDate validUntil, boolean active)
      Creates a new Promo instance.
      Parameters:
      promoId - The unique identifier for the promo
      code - The promo code
      description - The description of the promo
      discountAmount - The discount amount
      validFrom - The start date of the promo
      validUntil - The end date of the promo
      active - Whether the promo is currently active
